`,(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{children:(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.code,{className:"language-jsx",children:`import * as React from "react";

// 1. import \`NextUIProvider\` component
import {NextUIProvider} from "@nextui-org/react";

function App() {
  const navigate = useNavigateFromYourRouter();

  // 2. Add the \`navigate\` function to the \`NextUIProvider\`
  return (
    <NextUIProvider navigate={navigate}>
      <YourApplication />
    </NextUIProvider>
  );
}

'use client'

import {NextUIProvider} from '@nextui-org/react';
import {useRouter} from 'next/navigation'

export function Providers({children}: { children: React.ReactNode }) {
  const router = useRouter();

  return (
    <NextUIProvider navigate={router.push}>
      {children}
    </NextUIProvider>
  )
}
`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/simao/xiaosimao123/yooui/apps/doc/content/docs/guide/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-768477a1-7e3d-4e04-9234-d6272751edf3.mdx",lineNumber:57,columnNumber:1},this)},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/simao/xiaosimao123/yooui/apps/doc/content/docs/guide/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-768477a1-7e3d-4e04-9234-d6272751edf3.mdx",lineNumber:57,columnNumber:1},this),(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.h4,{id:"add-provider-to-root",children:"Add Provider to Root"},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/simao/xiaosimao123/yooui/apps/doc/content/docs/guide/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-768477a1-7e3d-4e04-9234-d6272751edf3.mdx",lineNumber:75,columnNumber:1},this),(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.p,{children:["Now, Go to your ",(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.code,{children:"root"},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/simao/xiaosimao123/yooui/apps/doc/content/docs/guide/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-768477a1-7e3d-4e04-9234-d6272751edf3.mdx",lineNumber:77,columnNumber:17},this)," layout page and wrap it with the ",(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.code,{children:"NextUIProvider"},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/simao/xiaosimao123/yooui/apps/doc/content/docs/guide/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-768477a1-7e3d-4e04-9234-d6272751edf3.mdx",lineNumber:77,columnNumber:57},this),":"]},void 0,!0,{fileName:"/Users/simao/xiaosimao123/yooui/apps/doc/content/docs/guide/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-768477a1-7e3d-4e04-9234-d6272751edf3.mdx",lineNumber:77,columnNumber:1},this),(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{children:(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.code,{className:"language-tsx",meta:"{6,8,10}",children:`// app/layout.tsx
import {Providers} from "./providers";

export default function RootLayout({children}: { children: React.ReactNode }) {
  return (
    <html lang="en" className='dark'>
      <body>
        <Providers>
          {children}
        </Providers>
      </body>
    </html>
  );
}

`,(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{children:(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.code,{className:"language-tsx",meta:"{7}",children:`// pages/_app.tsx
import type { AppProps } from 'next/app';
import {NextUIProvider} from '@nextui-org/react';
import {useRouter} from 'next/router';

function MyApp({ Component, pageProps }: AppProps) {
  const router = useRouter();

  return (
    <NextUIProvider navigate={router.push}>
      <Component {...pageProps} />
    </NextUIProvider>
  )
}

export default MyApp;
`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/simao/xiaosimao123/yooui/apps/doc/content/docs/guide/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-768477a1-7e3d-4e04-9234-d6272751edf3.mdx",lineNumber:106,columnNumber:1},this)},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/simao/xiaosimao123/yooui/apps/doc/content/docs/guide/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-768477a1-7e3d-4e04-9234-d6272751edf3.mdx",lineNumber:106,columnNumber:1},this),`

`,(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{children:(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.code,{className:"language-jsx",meta:"{6,9}",children:`// App.tsx or App.jsx
import {BrowserRouter, useNavigate} from 'react-router-dom';
import {NextUIProvider} from '@nextui-org/react';

function App() {
  const navigate = useNavigate();

  return (
    <NextUIProvider navigate={navigate}>
      {/* Your app here... */}
      <Routes>
        <Route path="/" element={<HomePage />} />
        {/* ... */}
      </Routes>
    </NextUIProvider>
  );
}


// main.tsx or main.jsx
ReactDOM.createRoot(document.getElementById('root')).render(
  <React.StrictMode>
    <BrowserRouter>
      <App />
    </BrowserRouter>
  </React.StrictMode>,
)
`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/simao/xiaosimao123/yooui/apps/doc/content/docs/guide/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-768477a1-7e3d-4e04-9234-d6272751edf3.mdx",lineNumber:132,columnNumber:1},this)},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/simao/xiaosimao123/yooui/apps/doc/content/docs/guide/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-768477a1-7e3d-4e04-9234-d6272751edf3.mdx",lineNumber:132,columnNumber:1},this),`

`,(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{children:(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.code,{className:"language-jsx",meta:"{14}",children:`// app/root.tsx
import {useNavigate, Outlet} from '@remix-run/react';
import {NextUIProvider} from '@nextui-org/react';

export default function App() {
  const navigate = useNavigate();

  return (
    <html lang="en">
      <head>
        {/* ... */}
      </head>
      <body>
        <NextUIProvider navigate={navigate}>
          <Outlet />
        </NextUIProvider>
        {/* ... */}
      </body>
    </html>
  );
}
`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/simao/xiaosimao123/yooui/apps/doc/content/docs/guide/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-768477a1-7e3d-4e04-9234-d6272751edf3.mdx",lineNumber:175,columnNumber:1},this)},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/simao/xiaosimao123/yooui/apps/doc/content/docs/guide/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-768477a1-7e3d-4e04-9234-d6272751edf3.mdx",lineNumber:175,columnNumber:1},this),`

`,(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{children:(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.code,{className:"language-jsx",children:`import {
  Tabs,
  Tab,
  Listbox,
  ListboxItem,
  Dropdown,
  DropdownTrigger,
  DropdownMenu,
  DropdownItem,
  Button,
  Link,
} from "@nextui-org/react";

function App() {
  return (
    <>
      <Tabs aria-label="Navigation">
        <Tab key="home" href="/home">Home</Tab>
        <Tab key="about" href="/about">About</Tab>
      </Tabs>
      <Listbox aria-label="Navigation">
        <ListboxItem key="home" href="/home">Home</ListboxItem>
        <ListboxItem key="about" href="/about">About</ListboxItem>
      </Listbox>
      <Dropdown>
        <DropdownTrigger>
          <Button>Open</Button>
        </DropdownTrigger>
        <DropdownMenu aria-label="Navigation">
          <DropdownItem key="home" href="/home">Home</DropdownItem>
          <DropdownItem key="about" href="/about">About</DropdownItem>
        </DropdownMenu>
      </Dropdown>
      <Link href="/home">Home</Link>
      <Link href="/about">About</Link>
    </>
  );
}
